page.title: 20CHARLOTTES DAY CONTINUED
page.content: { {1.30pm:}Untacked.Gave Juliet her feed,said "Goodbye" to my instructress and walked back down to Coleford. Caught bus home. {2pm:}Arrived Lydbrook and walked home. {2.10:}Had tea and read "Horse & Pony". {3pm:}Walked to friends house,played Swingball.This consists of pole with string attached to top.Ball on other end of string.Ball hit between players {4pm:}Went for walk with friend across field. Had races.Lots of fun. {5pm:}Came back from walk.Went home. {5.30pm:}Had tea and fed hamster.Played with hamster until supper. {7pm:}Had supper,sausages,beans,fried potatoes. {7.30pm:}Played with hamster until bed. {9pm:}Went to bed ,read "Stolen Ponies" {9.30pm:}Turned out light and went to sleep.
